pages.text: jaung-eulo namseong-gwa yeoseong-eul chang johasa
bojondoen jeong-aeg-eulo buteola
hananim-eun jeiui changjoleul yag soghasa
buwa gippeum-eul jusineun bun-isi myeo
hananim-eun siliuseu byeol-ui ju nim-isila
hananim-eun himsen yes adeuui baegseong-eul myeolmangke hago
samudeu baegseongdo geuleohge hayeo amugeosdo namji anhge hayeoss-eumyeo
geudeul ijeon-ui saaghago oman haessdeon noaui baegseongdo geuleohge hayeoss nola
hananim-eun los-ui go-euldeuldo jeon bogsikyeo
eungbeolloseo geudeul-eul gamssa beolyeoss eudoe
geulaedo neohuineun junim-ui eunhe e gwanhayeo nonjaenghaneunyo
ineun yes gyeong-gojadeul-e dwiieo on gyeong-gojala
ttaega dagaogo iss-eudoe
hananim oeeneun eoneu nugudo geugeos-eul jejihaji moshalila
geulaedo neohuineun igeos e daehayeo jolonghago issneunyo
usdoe ulji anihago
sigan-eul heosdoei bonaelyeo haneu nyo
hananimkke buboghago geubun man eul gyeongbaehala
simpan-ui nal-i gakkawo omae dal i dullo bunlidoedeola
geudeul-i geu yejeung-eul boassda ha deolado igeos-eun hangsang issneun masul-e bulgwahadago geudeul-eun malhanola
geudeul-eun jinlileul geoyeoghan chae geudeul ui yogmang-eul ttaleul ppun-ila geuleona modeun-il-eun jijeongdoen sigag-e ileunola
imi geudeul-eul gyeong-gohan iyagideul i geudeul-ege ileuleoss-eumyeo
wanseongdoen jihyedo iss-eoss-euna gyeong-go janeun geudeul-ege yuyonghaji moshaessdeola
geudeul-eul meollihala cheonsaga geu deul-eul geudeul-i silh-eohaneun gos-eulo ho chulhalila
